Our Story

The story of Vivi water begins in a desert oasis in Al-Muzahimiyah, its underground wells were formed among the palm trees. The company used Cutting edge technology for treating and bottling pure water, which depends on direct treatment without using chlorine in storage, so Vivi water maintained the highest standards of Water quality and purity with environmentally friendly manufacturing processes
